rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Could it be...friend already spend whole
advance that Chairman Bahn give, and
not have gold left to buy Abyss Vest...?

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Friend should at least remember to
save enough for thing friend want most.
Otherwise have egg on face, hmmm?

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0005
rows.name:
When money is spent, cannot unspend.
But friend in luck! I feel generous, will
bless friend to tune of 5,000G.

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0006
rows.name:
But deal is one-time deal! Friend better
go buy Abyss Vest now, before forget!
If squander this, there no Kanekane!

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0101
rows.name:
Rex...
Why friend look down in dumps?

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0102
rows.name:
Could it be...friend already spend whole
advance that Chairman Bahn give, and
not have gold left to send to Correl...?

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0104
rows.name:
Friend should have known, would need
90,000G, hm?

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0105
rows.name:
What friend think friend doing, hm?
Being bit of dum-dum, methinks, hm?
Not being so responsible, hmmmm...?

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0106
rows.name:
When money is spent, cannot unspend.
But friend in luck! I feel generous, will
bless friend with windfall of 90,000G.

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0107
rows.name:
But deal is one-time deal! Friend better
go send 90,000G to Iyasaki, pronto!
But that it! After this, no Kanekane!
